text: Alexandre Balmer (born 4 May 2000) is a Swiss cross-country and road racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Continental team . He participated at the 2018 UCI Mountain Bike World Championships, winning a medal.Team relay results ==Major results== ;2017 : National Junior Road Championships ::1st 20px Time trial ::3rd Road race : 2nd 15px Cross-country, UCI European Junior Mountain Bike Championships ;2018 : UCI Mountain Bike World Championships ::1st 15px Team relay ::1st 20px Junior cross-country : 1st 20px Cross-country, UCI European Junior Mountain Bike Championships : National Junior Road Championships ::1st 20px Time trial ::1st 20px Road race : 1st 20px Overall SPIE Internationale Juniorendriedaagse : 2nd 15px Road race, UEC European Junior Road Championships : 2nd Trofeo Buffoni : 4th Road race, UCI Junior Road World Championships ;2019 : 5th Time trial, National Under-23 Road Championships ;2020 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Under-23 Road Championships ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss male cyclists
title: Alexandre Balmer
